name: Le Fenix Sukhumvit

reviews.text: Went to check out Nest on the roof. Great vibe, love the music and friendly manager Johan helped explaining the menu. Wish there was more helpful people like this in restaurants. I had a mohito cocktail and some thai food, all in all, thr drink taste good but the food was ok.
reviews.title: Nest bar

reviews.text: Good spot for a chilled out evening.
reviews.title: Small Design Hotel in a nice Area

reviews.text: If you want to have some big night out in Bangkok, Le Fenix is a pretty good choice to stay. The rooms are clean and spacious. The Bathroom was clean as well. The Hotel is located in the main Nightlife Area of BKK. If you stay at Le Fenix you get free entrance to the main clubs like Bed Supperclub, which is just around the cornor. The Rooftop Bar has a nice view over BKK, even if the prices are high for Asia, compared to Europe its still cheap. Only the Indoor Pool and Gym was dissapointing because of the small size.
reviews.title: A lovely hep and modern hotel with an ideal location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Le fenix is a beatiful modern hotel with a great location. ITs a five minute walk from the train station situated in the heart of the city. A two minute walk from some great pubs and clubs including The Bed and breakfast.
reviews.title: Brilliant hotel with tuk tuk service

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Rooms are clean and modern. Service is great. The rooms and bathroom is also done up very well. EAch floor is colour co-oridnated in a different vibrant colour. Overall its great value for money and I'd love to go stay there again. The best part of the hotel is the roof top lounge. It is out of this world........you can choose to take a nice heap bed or still on a table. Gives u a beatiful view of the city and ohh does get that romantic one tickling. :)
reviews.title: Very simple but great location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This a decent hotel surrounded by nightclubs, so would be good for people into that scene.
reviews.title: OK

reviews.text: It needs a good clean as there a quite a few marks on the walls/ mould in the bathroom etc, but it is generally pretty tidy.
reviews.title: KEEP LOOKING AROUND

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The pool is tiny, and freezing considering how hot it is outside, and I never saw it being used by anyone.
reviews.title: Awesome, perfect end to our trip!

reviews.text: its an ok choice in an ok area, but nothing outstanding.
reviews.title: Loved it
Its in Sukhumvit
reviews.text: The internet is very expensive and the room only comes with 2 hours free, and it must be used all in one go, which is a bit of a drawback.

Stayed here in Dec 2010.The hotel is located directly opposite Q bar on Soi 11 and round the corner from Bed Supperclub.Staying here gets u free entry to both places by showing your room keycard so if in Bangkok for nightclubs this is the place to stay considering Bed charges 800 Baht for entry.Stay at Le Fenix and u get in both for free.The hotel itself is modern and trendy and the rooms spacious with excellent air con and great shower.On the rooftop of the hotel is the Nest an open air bar which is very popular.Soi 11 is in the heart of Bangkok and out with Bed and Q bar has the Man Utd bar,Cheap Charlies,OZ bar,a large German bar,a few restaurants and a few streetside bars.The hotel is great and the location unbeatable for nightlife...
reviews.title: Best hotel to stay in for clubbing on Soi11

reviews.text: The hotel itself is pretty cool, nice design, nice restaurant, couple nice bars.
reviews.title: Can be much better, but the smell kills.

reviews.text: I would have given this place much higher rating if not for the awful smell inside. I found out later that it's their AC system which produces a smell of a wet armpit (like one my friends said), wet, humid, dirty towel smell. So, if you want to book it, make sure you ask the question about their AC system - is it new or the same as in November 2010.
reviews.title: Good service but filthy quilt and dangerous furniture

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Location is OK, but not that great, it is actually good 10 minutes walk from Sukhumvit Rd. walking on Soi 11. Not a big complaint, but a little.
reviews.title: Great value for money

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: For single people, this is overnight guest friendly hotel, so that is good thing.
reviews.title: Best value for money !

reviews.text: My girlfriend and a friend of hers went to Pattaya and Bangkok for a well-deserved golfing and city holiday. I wasn't initially able to join because of work, but late decided to join the Bangkok leg as I hadn't had a holiday with my girlfriend for ages. I decided to surprise her by just turning up at their room doorstep, and I know they booked Le Fenix.
reviews.title: Great location, great value for money

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Because of the room rate (USD57, from the Accor website), I had very low expectations of this hotel. So I was pleasantly surprised by the following:
reviews.title: Std sized clean room but small bathroom

reviews.text: 1) I wrote to the hotel requesting a room right next door to my girlfriend's, and got a prompt reply saying that they have arranged it, no problem,
reviews.title: Two years of excellent value
Location good but not good value
reviews.text: 2) The hotel was centrally located, quite clean and very hip and modern.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: 3) Check in was ultra-fast. I was in fact given a room next door to my girl and her friend's through a connecting door (the look on her face when I rang her to ask her to open the door and she saw me standing there was priceless, although it WAS 1am - but her friend slept through all of it and didn't even know until the next morning when she woke up and found my girlfriend not in the adjacent bed). This was very thoughtful and I later found out that the hotel upgraded our rooms as only these had connecting doors.
reviews.title: Stilish hotel for a great price

description: Le Fenix Sukhumvit is located in the heart of Sukhumvit, a central district of Bangkok with easy access to the skytrain.The surrounding area is well known for its vibrant street markets, bars, restaurants and shopping malls as well as for the consulatesand embassies, making it a popular destination for holiday visitors as well as for corporate and business guests.The hotel features 147 stylish designer rooms with WiFi Internet, a lobby bar, a restaurant, a fitness centre and an indoor swimming pool.
